name: Aris (itch) (Leo Red)
description:
Aris: The unearthly treasure

Earther and matians are enemies now. mars full of minerals and earth depleting from it. Earther in a desperate move, send a mutated fox to mine out minerals. The main task is to find Aris. Known to be the treasure of mars, was first recordered by a rover in 2021. Aris is capable of creating unlimited energy. Find the secrets.....and try not to die

Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys for movement

Mouse to attack/mine

Credits

Made by Leo Red [Midhil]

Made for Gamedev.js 2022

Game Engine: GDevelop

Art software: Libresprite

Font: momentum by datagoblin

Sound: Kenny Assets

Color palette: Apollo by AdamCYounis
